CustomField.formula: IF(NOT(ISNULL(Reminder_Email_Start_Date__c)), (CASE( MONTH( Reminder_Email_Start_Date__c+ VALUE(RAI_DAYS__c)) , 1, "January", 2, "February", 3, "March", 4, "April", 5, "May", 6, "June", 7, "July", 8, "August", 9, "September", 10, "October", 11, "November", "December") +' '+ Text(DAY( Reminder_Email_Start_Date__c+ VALUE(RAI_DAYS__c))) +', '+ Text(YEAR( Reminder_Email_Start_Date__c+ VALUE(RAI_DAYS__c)))),'')
CustomField.label: RAI Days Date
